Title: Permits licensees under the alcoholic beverage control law to sell and deliver alcoholic beverages for off-premises consumption; and provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
Summary: Permits licensees under the alcoholic beverage control law to sell and deliver alcoholic beverages for off-premises consumption; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to permitting licensees under the alcoholic beverage control law to sell and deliver alcoholic beverages for off-premises consumption; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
